JOB DESCRIPTION: The Lead Test Engineer is a technical position responsible for Leading the Software Testing of products being developed for advancements in medication preparation and delivery to ensure quality and reliability issues are discovered early in the development cycle to inform software changes. The individual would have responsibility for working cross-functionally to understand end-user needs and requirements and mapping them to software test strategies and protocols in addition to diagnosis of complex issues.   The responsibilities can include but are not limited to: leading to software test design, prioritization and execution for critical features and functions as part of Agile scrum teams and documenting the test results to inform the development team of opportunities for improvements.    Job Description    The individual would have responsibility for working closely with other members of SW teams to understand the clinical use cases, usability and system requirements; provide contribution and expertise in planning, developing, executing and maintaining test cases and test automation tools and relevant infrastructure support for OnPrem and Hosted SW applications and services in a fast-paced, high-demand Windows Server environment.
